item.title: Nvidia earnings are a test for chip stocks as software has stolen the limelight
item.description: Nvidia‚Äôs earnings could give a jolt to other AI semiconductor plays if the outlook impresses, but don‚Äôt expect software stocks to lose shine during a seasonally strong quarter.

item.title: Liberty Media to spin off assets; CEO Greg Maffei to step down at year-end
item.description: Chairman John Malone will become interim CEO of Liberty Media. Liberty Media's investor day is set to take place on Thursday in Manhattan.

item.description: Chairman John Malone will become interim CEO of Liberty Media. Liberty Media's investor day is set to take place on Thursday in Manhattan.

item.title: Amazon debuts discount store with everything under $20 to take on Temu and Shein
item.description: Called "Amazon Haul," the storefront is accessible through the company's mobile app, and it promises "crazy low prices" on a plethora of goods.

item.title: Buy now, pay later giant Klarna files for U.S. IPO
item.description: Klarna, which is known for its popular "buy now, pay later" business, has filed IPO documents with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.

item.title: Will bitcoin keep going up? 3 warning signs it could start dropping soon.
item.description: Bitcoin‚Äôs rally may still have room to run, but the cryptocurrency is likely to face a major pullback in the coming days if history repeats itself, according to analysts at Glassnode.

item.title: VW's $5.8 billion investment in Rivian isn't guaranteed. Here are the milestones the EV maker needs to hit
item.description: VW's capital to Rivian isn't guaranteed, and neither is the success of the joint venture. Major automotive tie-ups don't always result in long-term successes.

item.title: European markets trade lower as U.S. inflation data digested; Just Eat Takeaway, Siemens Energy rise
item.description: European stocks declined Wednesday early afternoon, with global markets assessing the latest U.S. inflation data.

item.title: 2-year Treasury yield leads drop in rates after October CPI meets expectations
item.description: Yields on U.S. government debt broadly fell Wednesday morning after October‚Äôs consumer-price index report produced no big surprises and boosted the market-implied likelihood of a quarter-point rate cut from the Federal Reserve next month.

item.title: Elon Musk will attend Trump's first post-election meeting with House Republicans in D.C.
item.description: Tesla and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk was one of the top backers of President-elect Donald Trump's winning campaign against Vice President Kamala Harris.

item.title: Annual inflation rate hit 2.6% in October, meeting expectations
item.description: The consumer price index was expected to increase 0.2% in October and show a 2.6% 12-month rate.

item.title: Merger activity is down 40% from its peak. Citigroup CEO Jane Fraser sees a ‚Äòbig unlock‚Äô ahead.
item.description: The future could see more megamergers, middle-market deals and initial public offerings.

item.title: Rocket Lab stock surges 40% after company reports strong revenue growth, first Neutron deal
item.description: Rocket Lab jumped in post-market trading after the company reported third-quarter results.

item.title: Chelsea Manning: Censorship still a dominant threat
item.description: Former Army intelligence analyst Chelsea Manning speaks to CNBC's Karen Tso at the Web Summit tech conference in Lisbon.
